name: Angels
content: It is more than I thought could exist
它的存在已超乎我的想象
As in love with you as I am
与你陷入爱河 就像我一样
As in love with you as I am
与你陷入爱河 就像我一样
As in love with you as I am
与你陷入爱河 就像我一样
陷入爱 陷入爱 陷入爱河
The things that no one else sees
这些都是别人所不了解的
And the end comes too soon
就像关于天使的一个梦境
却无法带他们来到现实
As in love with you as I am
As in love with you as I am
As in love with you as I am
我知道你清楚我的意思
I know you know what I mean
As long as you're with me
